comments.body: While not exactly the same type, this is compatible with `NewSharedInformerFactory` calls. It might be worth to merge those two again. I think the chance is high that nobody passes around constructors such that this change will make any trouble.

I agree that compatibility is probably not an issue here, but I actually prefer having a separate method for passing the options. It is more verbose and immediately clear to the caller that this method accepts additional options.
